moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Gather Outlook Email Messages
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module allows reading and searching email messages from the local
        Outlook installation using PowerShell. Please note that this module is
        manipulating the victims keyboard/mouse.  If a victim is active on the target
        system, he may notice the activities of this module. Tested on Windows 8.1
        x64 with Office 2013.
author: Wesley Neelen <security@forsec.nl>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: Powershell::persist
options.description: Run the payload in a loop

options.name: Powershell::wrap_double_quotes
options.description: Wraps the -Command argument in single quotes

options.name: Powershell::method
options.description: Payload delivery method (Accepted: net, reflection, old, msil)

options.name: Powershell::Post::timeout
options.description: Powershell execution timeout, set < 0 to run async without termination

options.name: KEYWORD
options.description: Search e-mails by the keyword specified here

options.name: A_TRANSLATION
options.description: Fill in the translation of the word "Allow" in the targets system language, to click on the security popup.

options.name: ACF_TRANSLATION
options.description: Fill in the translation of the phrase "Allow access for" in the targets system language, to click on the security popup.

options.name: TIMEOUT
options.description: The maximum time (in seconds) to wait for any Powershell scripts to complete
